languages.text: "Узрите же, Звездное Сиятельство, двух омерзительных еретиков, порочащих сам лик Тассеры своим существованием". {n}Таддуа усмехается, но в той усмешке нет и намека на веселье.{/n} "Быть может, степень вины их различна, и все же оба заслужили вступить в пылающее нутро Фесмофориуса за главное из своих прегрешений — искажение священного лика Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Конечно, пытки не пощадили ослепительную красоту нашей героини. И ведь какая ирония — то был придуманный ее же Онгольдом кипящий котел. С кем поведешься..." {n}Маски неистовствуют, глумясь над беззащитной жертвой.{/n}
traits.speaker: FW_Lawman

languages.text: "Your Celestial Highness, behold, two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Taddua chuckles, but his sneer is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may vary, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the worst of their transgressions: distorting the sacred face of Humanity."
languages.original_text: "Узрите же, Звездное Сиятельство, двух омерзительных еретиков, порочащих сам лик Тассеры своим существованием". {n}Таддуа усмехается, но в той усмешке нет и намека на веселье.{/n} "Быть может, степень вины их различна, и все же оба заслужили вступить в пылающее нутро Фесмофориуса за главное из своих прегрешений — искажение священного лика Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, behold the two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Ursus sneers, but his grin is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may be different, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the most grievous of their transgressions, distorting the sacred face of Humanity."

languages.text: “来自上界的大人啊，请看。这是两个该死的异端分子，他们的存在本身，就是对塔瑟拉的玷污。”{n}塔杜亚笑了起来，但他的嗤笑声却没有任何笑意。{/n}“他们的罪责程度或许各不相同，但他们都犯下了最可鄙的罪行。他们扭曲了人类神圣的面貌，理当进入菲斯摩弗瑞斯炽热的圣体。”
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, behold, two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Taddua chuckles, but his sneer is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may vary, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the worst of their transgressions: distorting the sacred face of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人啊，请看。这是两个该死的异端分子，他们的存在本身，就是对塔瑟拉的玷污。”{n}塔杜亚笑了起来，但他的嗤笑声却没有任何笑意。{/n}“他们的罪责程度或许各不相同，但他们都犯下了最可鄙的罪行。他们扭曲了人类神圣的面貌，理当进入菲斯摩弗瑞斯炽热的圣体。”
“来自上界的大人啊，请看。这是两个该死的异端分子，他们的存在本身，就是对塔瑟拉的玷污。”{n}乌苏斯笑了起来，但他的嗤笑声却没有任何笑意。{/n}“他们的罪责程度或许各不相同，但他们都犯下了最可鄙的罪行。他们扭曲了人类神圣的面貌，理当进入菲斯摩弗瑞斯炽热的圣体。”

languages.text: «Excelencia Celestial, contemple a estos dos herejes despreciables que mancillan la faz misma de Thassera con su mera existencia». {n}Taddua ríe entre dientes, pero su risa está completamente desprovista de alegría.{/n} «Presentan un grado variable de culpabilidad, pero ambos merecen entrar en las candentes entrañas del fesmoforio por la peor de sus transgresiones: deformar el sagrado semblante de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, behold, two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Taddua chuckles, but his sneer is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may vary, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the worst of their transgressions: distorting the sacred face of Humanity."

«Excelencia Celestial, contemple a estos dos herejes despreciables que mancillan la faz misma de Thassera con su mera existencia». {n}Ursus ríe entre dientes, pero su risa está completamente desprovista de alegría.{/n} «Presentan un grado variable de culpabilidad, pero ambos merecen entrar en las candentes entrañas del fesmoforio por la peor de sus transgresiones: deformar el sagrado semblante de la Humanidad».

languages.text: "Semavi Efendimiz, işte varlıklarıyla Thassera'nın ta kendisini lekeleyen iki iğrenç kâfir." {n}Taddua kıkırdıyor ama alaycı sırıtışında neşeden eser yok.{/n} "Suçlarının derecesi değişebilir ama ikisi de en kötü suçları yüzünden, İnsanlığın kutsal yüzünü bozdukları için Pesmoforyus'un yanan bağırsaklarına girmeyi hak ediyor."
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, behold, two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Taddua chuckles, but his sneer is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may vary, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the worst of their transgressions: distorting the sacred face of Humanity."

"Semavi Efendimiz, işte varlıklarıyla Thassera'nın ta kendisini lekeleyen iki iğrenç kâfir." {n}Ursus kıkırdıyor ama alaycı sırıtışında neşeden eser yok.{/n} "Suçlarının derecesi değişebilir ama ikisi de en kötü suçları yüzünden, İnsanlığın kutsal yüzünü bozdukları için Pesmoforyus'un yanan bağırsaklarına girmeyi hak ediyor."

languages.text: 「天の閣下、その存在によってタッセーラの顔を汚す忌まわしい二人の異端者をご覧ください」{n}タッドゥアはクスクスと笑うが、彼の冷笑にはまったく陽気さがない。{/n}「彼らの罪の程度は異なるかもしれないが、両者は、人類の神聖な顔を歪ませるという最悪の罪のためにフェスモフォリウスの赤々と燃え上がるはらわたの中に入ることになる」
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, behold, two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Taddua chuckles, but his sneer is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may vary, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the worst of their transgressions: distorting the sacred face of Humanity."

traits.locale_text: 「天の閣下、その存在によってタッセーラの顔を汚す忌まわしい二人の異端者をご覧ください」{n}アーサスはクスクスと笑うが、彼の冷笑にはまったく陽気さがない。{/n}「彼らの罪の程度は異なるかもしれないが、両者は、人類の神聖な顔を歪ませるという最悪の罪のためにフェスモフォリウスの赤々と燃え上がるはらわたの中に入ることになる」
「天の閣下、その存在によってタッセーラの顔を汚す忌まわしい二人の異端者をご覧ください」{n}アーサスはクスクスと笑うが、彼の冷笑にはまったく陽気さがない。{/n}「彼らの罪の程度は異なるかもしれないが、両者は、人類の神聖な顔を歪ませるという最悪の罪のためにフェスモフォリウスの赤々と燃え上がるはらわたの中に入ることになる」

languages.text: « Voyez, Votre Altesse Célestissime, devant vous se tiennent deux ignobles hérétiques dont la seule existence est un chancre sur la face de Thassera. {n}Taddua pousse un ricanement sinistre, dénué de toute joie.{/n} Si leur degré de culpabilité est variable, tous deux méritent d'être livrés aux entrailles brûlantes du Phesmophorius en châtiment de la pire transgression qu'ils aient jamais commise, à savoir dénaturer la face sacrée de l'humanité. »
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, behold, two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Taddua chuckles, but his sneer is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may vary, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the worst of their transgressions: distorting the sacred face of Humanity."

« Voyez, Votre Altesse Célestissime, devant vous se tiennent deux ignobles hérétiques dont la seule existence est un chancre sur la face de Thassera. {n}Ursus pousse un ricanement sinistre, dénué de toute joie.{/n} Si leur degré de culpabilité est variable, tous deux méritent d'être livrés aux entrailles brûlantes du Phesmophorius en châtiment de la pire transgression qu'ils aient jamais commise, à savoir dénaturer la face sacrée de l'humanité. »

languages.text: "Eure himmlische Hoheit, seht, zwei verabscheuungswürdige Ketzer, die das Antlitz von Thassera mit ihrer Existenz besudeln." {n}Taddua lacht gehässig und ohne jede Heiterkeit.{/n} "Das Maß ihrer Schuld kann variieren, doch sie beide verdienen es, in die brennenden Eingeweide des Phesmophorius zu kommen, für das schlimmste ihrer Verbrechen: die Verzerrung des heiligen Gesichtes der Menschheit."
languages.original_text: "Your Celestial Highness, behold, two loathsome heretics who blemish the very face of Thassera with their existence." {n}Taddua chuckles, but his sneer is completely devoid of mirth.{/n} "The degree of their guilt may vary, but they both deserve to enter the blazing bowels of the Phesmophorius for the worst of their transgressions: distorting the sacred face of Humanity."

"Eure himmlische Hoheit, seht, zwei verabscheuungswürdige Ketzer, die das Antlitz von Thassera mit ihrer Existenz besudeln." {n}Ursus lacht gehässig.{/n} "Das Maß ihrer Schuld kann variieren, doch sie beide verdienen es, in die brennenden Eingeweide des Phesmophorius zu kommen, für das schlimmste ihrer Verbrechen: die Verzerrung des heiligsten Gesichts der Menschheit."
